item.title: Pokemon Type effectiveness Calculator
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.description: Pokemon effectiveness Type Calculator is a powerful tool that helps trainers analyze and strategize battles by calculating the strengths and effectiveness of different Pokemon types. With this interactive calculator, you can input the types of attacking and defending Pokemon and instantly receive a comprehensive breakdown of the damage multipliers. Explore the effectiveness of moves and plan your team composition wisely to gain the upper hand in battles. Master type matchups and become a formidable Pokemon trainer with the Pokemon Type Calculator.

item.title: Pokémon Sword & Shield IV Calculator
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.description: The Pokémon Sword & Shield IV Calculator is a powerful tool that allows you to determine the Individual Values (IVs) and other important stats of your Pokémon. Use this calculator to optimize your Pokémon's IVs and enhance your battle strategies. Start calculating now!

item.title: Pokemon GO Evolution Calculator
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.description: Maximize your Pokemon Go experience with our Evolution Calculator! Easily determine the CP, stats, and potential of your Pokemon's evolution. Plan your strategy, optimize your battles, and become a master trainer. Catch 'em all and level up your game with our intuitive Evolution Calculator tool. Start evolving your Pokemon with confidence today!

item.title: Pokémon Sun & Moon IV Calculator
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.description: Welcome to the Pokémon Sun & Moon IV Calculator! This calculator tool allows you to determine the Individual Values (IVs) and other important stats of your Pokémon. It helps you optimize your Pokémon's performance in battles by providing valuable insights into their hidden stats. Easily select your Pokémon species, choose the nature, input base stats and effort points, and get accurate calculations for IVs and other stats. Enhance your Pokémon training strategies and take your battles to new heights with the Pokémon Sun & Moon IV Calculator. Start maximizing your Pokémon's potential now!

item.title: Random Pokémon Team Generator: 1000+ Pokemons
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.description: Generate a random Pokemon team for your battles and adventures! Our Pokemon team generator creates unique and diverse teams that include a variety of types, abilities, and moves. Discover new strategies and challenge your opponents with an unpredictable lineup. Catch 'em all and conquer the Pokemon world with our random team generator!

item.title: Pokémon Sun & Moon Team Builder
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.description: Plan and build your perfect Pokémon team for the Sun & Moon games. This tool allows you to use filters to search for Pokémon, teach them different moves, and check type coverage charts. You can also share your team with others and even import data from Pokémon Showdown.

item.title: Pokemon Go CP Calculator
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.description: Calculate the Combat Power (CP) of your favorite Pokemon using our Pokemon Go CP calculator. Enter the Pokemon's name, level, and Individual Values (IV) to determine its CP. Discover the true power that lies within your Pokemon!

item.title: Pokemon Go IV Calculator
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.description: The Pokemon Go IV Calculator is a powerful tool that helps you determine the Individual Values (IVs) of your Pokemon. Discover the hidden potential of your Pokemon by calculating their IVs and optimizing their stats for battles.

item.title: Random Pokemon Generator
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.description: An online tool that generates random Pokemon names with ratings. Create unique and exciting Pokemon combinations for your gaming adventures.
